text: I'm Thomas Kaplan of the New York Times
in a big setback to the British private
equity magnate guy hands a jury here in
federal court in lower Manhattan came
back with a verdict today against mr.
hands in his lawsuit against Citigroup
mr. hands had sued Citigroup saying they
lied to him a few years back when his
private equity firm terra firma acquired
the music company emi group which now
appears headed toward bankruptcy the
case was watched closely on Wall Street
where Citigroup claimed that mr. hands
essentially was suing over a standard
case of buyer's remorse mr. hands on the
other hand accused Citigroup of
pretending as if there were another
bidder or interested party in EMI group
to drive up the price mr. hands did not
speak to reporters afterwards but in a
statement his firm terra firma expressed
disappointment in the ruling and said it
may appeal
